item.title: Regtest Guide
Transactions
item.description: Library supports mainnet, testnet and signet and requires internet to work. Despite this section being called Transactions, it will actually show how to generate specific types of Bitcoin addresses and then make a transaction to spend the funds that each specific address type will hold. Bitcoin doesn't actually have transaction types but has different types of addresses. Each type of address has a different way of "unlocking" its funds.
